Text: MahoniaStoneville Prepay Cc Will this prepay be between ChaseMahonia and ENA or ENGM and do you have wiring instructions Thanks Forwarded by Mary Lynne RufferHOUECT on AM Enron Global Finance From Michael Garberding PM To Mary Lynne CT cc John nron Subject MahoniaStoneville Prepay Mary LynneJohn Just wanted to follow up on my earlier email I reran my calculation for the Enron Cost of FundsDeal Cost versus Libor The following reconciles this calculation Difference between Libor and ENE Cost of Funds Difference between ENE Cost of Funds and Deal Spread bps Total Difference between Deal and Libor Sorry for the mistake and again please let me know if there are any questions Thanks Mike Forwarded by Michael GarberdingHOUECT on PM Enron Global Finance From Michael Garberding PM To Mary Lynne CT cc John nron Subject MahoniaStoneville Prepay Mary Lynne Just wanted to updated you on the current prepay that is scheduled to close next thursday th with Chase and Fleet The prepay is anticipated as follows Total Funds Financing Expenses Upfront to Banks Surety Bonds Total Fees Anticipated Cash Flow The anticipated reserve related to ENE cost of funds versus the prepay is estimated to be while the timing differential between delivery date and settlement date days is estimated to be Please let me know if you have any questions or need any additional information Thanks again for your help Michael

Re MahoniaStoneville Prepay Cc I understand we are paying the additional that was sent last Friday back this week Can you let me know what day this will need to go out so we can have Treasury reserve the funds Thanks

Re Margin Change for Crude Oil Unleaded Gasoline and Heating Oilchange my name to Greg Whiting Thanks From Tana Jones on AM To Mary Lynne CT cc Subject Margin Change for Crude Oil Unleaded Gasoline and Heating Oil Mary Lynne These notices will be coming by email on a going forward basis Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on AM AM To cc Subject Margin Change for Crude Oil Unleaded Gasoline and Heating Oil Notice No September TO ALL NYMEX MEMBERS AND MEMBER FIRMS ALL NYMEX CLEARING FIRMS ALL NYMEX OPERATIONS MANAGERS FROM Neal Wolkoff Executive Vice President SUBJECT MARGIN RATE CHANGE Effective Date Tuesday September close of business Futures Contracts Crude Oil Futures Unleaded Gasoline Futures Heating Oil Futures Contract Months All Months Rate Change NYMEX Division Margins on Crude Oil Unleaded Gasoline and Heating Oil Futures Contracts Effective at Close of Business on Tuesday September Clearing Member Maintenance Margin Old New Member Customer Initial Margin Old New NonMember Customer Initial Margin Old New The margin credit for NYMEX Light Sweet CrudeIPE Brent Crude Oil futures spread positions will also be increased from to at the Clearing Member level as of Tuesday September The net margin after the spread will remain unchanged Effective at Close of Business on Tuesday September Clearing MemberMaintenance Margin NYMEX Light Sweet Crude Less NYMEX Light SweetIPE Brent Crude Spread Credit Net Margin of Spread Member Customer Initial Margin NYMEX Light Sweet Crude Less NYMEX Light SweetIPE Brent Crude Spread Credit Net Margin of Spread NonMember Customer Initial Margin NYMEX Light Sweet Crude Less NYMEX Light SweetIPE Brent Crude Spread Credit Net Margin of Spread Should you have any questions regarding these changes please contact Artie McCoy at or Joe Sanguedolce at This notice supersedes all previous notices regarding outright margins for the NYMEX Crude Oil Unleaded Gasoline or Heating Oil Futures Contracts and the margin credit for the NYMEX Light Sweet Crude OilIPE Brent Crude futures spread positions Please click on the link below to indicate you have received this email emailemaillogcfmuseremailrefdoc Note If you click on the above line and nothing happens please copy the text between the quotes open your internet browser paste it into the web site address and press Return
Mary Lynne RufferHOUECT is out of the officewill be out of the office from until I will respond to your message when I return
